results.title: Microsoft musical instruments (PC)
results.brief_description: You’re about to enter one of the world’s largest music studios, filled with musical instruments from every cornerr of the earth - and you can play any one you want. Just click the mouse to learn about how an instrument works, hear music examples, or listen to music of all types and origins. Children can master it quickly and adults will will be so captivated they’ll want to play for hours. For music lovers the world over. SYSTEM REQUIREMERNTS: a mulitmeedia PC; 386SX or higher processor; 2 Mb of RAM; 30 Mb hard disk; audio board; VGA or VHA + display; CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MS-DOS 3.1 or later; MS-DOS CD-ROM extensions (MSCDEX) version 2.2 or later (provided with your CD-ROM drive).

results.title: Microsoft musical instruments (MAC)
results.brief_description: You’re about to enter one of the largest music studios in the world, filled with instruments from every corner of the earth - and you can play any one you want. Just click the mouse to learn how an instrument works, hear music examples, or listen to musical styles from around the globe. It is so simple a child can use it immediately, yet captivating enough that an adult will want to play for hours. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Any Macintosh computer with a compatible colour monitor; system 6.0.7 or later; 4 Mb of RAM; at least 1 Mb of available hard disk space; CD-ROM drive.

results.title: Microsoft golf (PC)
results.brief_description: Close your eyes and smell the sea. You’re mesmerized by the drama and wonder of Torrey Pines. A bird chirps. The wind shifts. Thwaak. You follow the ball as it glides towards the sun - this is multimedia golf. SYSTEMS REQUIREMENultimedia Pc or compatible with 386SX or higher microprocessor; 2MB of RAM, 5MB of hard-disk space; VGA or higher resolution monitor; MS DOS operating system, version 3.1 or higher; Microsoft Windows operating system, version 3;1 or higher.

results.title: Microsoft Gahan Wilson's ultimate haunted house (PC)
results.brief_description: Race against the clock to escape a creepy, spooky haunted house that changes every time you play! Designed by Gahan Wilson this game has easy to access game help and loads of eerie sound effects to make playing fun for ages 8 and up! SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: a Multimedia PC or compatible; 486 DX or higher microprocessor running at 33 MHz; 8 Mb of RAM; 40 Kb of available hard disk space; Windows-compatible sound card; SVGA display capable of 256 colours; double-speed CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MS-DOS 5.0 or later;

results.title: Microsoft explorapedia: the world of nature (PC)
results.brief_description: A wonderful multimedia exploration of the animal kingdom designed for children in primary school. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC with 486SX or higher processor; 4 MB or memory (8 MB recommended); at least 8MB of available hard-disk space; double-speed DC-ROM drive, audi board, and 256 colour Super VGA monitor; MS-DOS Windows operating system version 3.1 or later;

results.title: Microsoft Excel 4.0 for Windows: introductory skills
results.brief_description: Narrated by Sheila Swanson, a step-by-step guide to Microsoft Excel 4.0 for Windows, a powerful spreadsheet program with a multitude of both personal and professional uses. Provides the basics of using this program including using basics of Windows, starting Excel, use of command menus, using the toolbar, using the help feature, moving around the worksheet, entering data, creating and copying formats, undoing changes, adjusting rows and columns and saving and printing worksheet.

results.title: Microsoft Excel 4.0 for Windows: intermediate and advanced skills
results.brief_description: Narrated by Sheila Swanson, this is a step-by-step guide showing how to perform advanced functions in Excel 4.0 for Windows. Skills learned include: how to create charts using Chartwizard, enhancing charts, giving your spreadsheet that professional touch, formatting using chart windows, customising the toolbar, creating and running macros, linking single cells, linking a range of cells and creating dynamic data links.

results.title: Microsoft encarta 1994 (MAC)
results.brief_description: An interactive learning resource with text of Funk & Wagnalls New Encylopedia, sound, image, animation, video clips, maps, interactive charts Timeline, atlas and knowledge adventure game. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Colour Mac II or higher, Colour Classic or Powerbook; System 7 or later; 4 Mb of memory; at least 3 Mb of available hard disk space; CD_ROM drive.

results.title: Microsoft encarta '95 (PC)
results.brief_description: An interactive learning resource with text of the Funk & Wagnalls New Encyclopedia, sound, images, animation, video clips, maps, interactive charts, timeline, atlas and knowledge adventure game, also includes interactive tour of Encarta called Mind-maze. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC or PC compatible with 386SX or higher processor; audio board; SVGA resolution monitor with 256 colours or higher; 4Mb of RAM; at least 3.5Mb of available disk space; Microsoft Windows 3.1; MS-DOS 3.1 or later.

results.title: Microsoft dinosaurs (PC)
results.brief_description: Grab your jungle gear, put on your pith helmet and brace yourself - you’re going on a journey of a lifetime! Travel deep into the forest primeval and come face to face with those incredible animals that roamed and ruled the Earth millions of years ago. Hear them growl, explore their habitats and see who they meet in mortal combat.
